channel.title: Help with some vb would be great
channel.description: ok soo i was bored and saw something about an auth system so i got reallly bored and made this, and now i made the basic layout of it, but in visual basic how do i make it so when you click the "Send" button it saves the information in a word or notepad file? and so that it clears the text box. if you guys can help it would be greatly apreciated. Thanks Pistolbob
